title: SMIN: Poor Electoral Showing For Modi's BJP Actually Improved The Case For India
content: ronniechua/iStock via Getty Images In my previous article advocating India over China I suggested that an election disappointment for PM Narendra Modi was one of the risks. Although it seemed like long odds at the time, an election disappointment was exactly what PM Modi and his Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) got. Despite exit polling which showed the BJP winning more than 300 seats in the Lok Sabha (lower house of parliament), the laborious final count gave the BJP just 240 seats, 63 fewer than...

title: 24 કલાકમાં 145 તાલુકામાં મેઘમહેર:ગઈકાલે સૌરાષ્ટૃમાં મેઘરાજાની ધમાકેદાર બેટિંગ રહી, સવારે જુનાગઢ-સોમનાથ તો સાંજે રાજકોટ-જામનગરમાં ધમધોકાટ વરસાદ વરસ્યો
content: ગુજરાત પર એક સાથે ત્રણ સિસ્ટમ સર્જાતા હવામાન વિભાગ દ્વારા આગામી પાંચ દિવસ દરમિયાન સાર્વત્રિક મેઘમહેરની આગાહી કરવામાં આવી છે. જે ગઈકાલે દક્ષિણ ગુજરાત અને સૌરાષ્ટ્રમાં કેટલાક જિલ્લામાં ભારેથી અતિભારે વરસાદની આગાહી વચ્ચે જૂનાગઢ, ગીર સોમનાથ, રાજકોટ, જામન 5 તાલુકામાં તોફાની બેટિંગ જોવા મળી ગઈકાલે ગુજરાતમાં સૌથી વધુ સૌરાષ્ટ્રમાં મેઘમહેર જોવા મળી હતી. જેમાં સોમનાથના પાટણ-વેરાવળમાં અને જુનાગઢના માણાવદરમાં અને રાજકોટના વિંછીયામાં સૌથી વધુ 5 ઈંચ વરસાદ ખાબક્યો હતો. ત્યારબાર જુનાગઢનાં માંગરોળ, માળીયા...

title: 斎藤知事"おねだり疑惑" 高級コーヒーメーカー受け取った兵庫県の幹部職員 警察から任意聴取 半年以上返却おこたり「訓告」処分(ABCニュース)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 7/17(水) 11:37 配信 ABCテレビ 兵庫県の斎藤知事に対する内部告発に関連して、企業からの贈答品を返却せずに処分を受けた幹部職員が、警察から任意の事情聴取を受けていたことが県議会で取り上げられました。 兵庫県の「産業労働部長」は、去年8月に県内の企業からコーヒーメーカーを受け取ったあと、半年以上も返却をおこたったとして、5月に「訓告」処分を受けました。 斎藤知事の疑惑を告発する文書には、産業労働部長が高級コーヒーメーカーを秘書課に送らせるよう、斎藤知事から指示を受けたという内容が書かれています。...

title: આયોજન:વેરાવળ શહેરમાં તહેવારોને લઈ પોલીસની ફ્લેગમાર્ચ
content: વેરાવળમાં તહેવાર સબબ કાયદો અને વ્યવસ્થાની સ્થિતી જળવાઇ રહે તે અનુસંધાને વેરાવળ શહેર વિસ્તારમાં ફ્લેગ માર્ચનુ આયોજન વેરાવળ સીટી પોલીસ સ્ટેશન દ્વારા કરવામાં આવ્યુ હતું વેરાવળ સીટી પોલીસ ઇન્સપેકટર એચ.આર.ગોસ્વામી તથા પો.સબ ઇન્સ. આર.આર.રાયજાદા તથા એસ.એમ.

title: रोहित, विराट और 1 खिलाड़ी को BCCI ने दी छूट, टेस्ट टीम में मिलेगी डायरेक्ट जगह
creator: News18 Hindi
content: नई दिल्ली. बीसीसीआई के नए नियम के मुताबिक भारत की तरफ से नहीं खेल रहे हर एक खिलाड़ी को फ्री टाइम में घरेलू मुकाबलों में उतरना होगा. टेस्ट टीम में जगह बनाने के लिए हर एक खिलाड़ी के लिए कम से कम 1 डोमेस्टिक मुकाबला खेलना बाध्य कर दिया गया है. भारतीय क्रिकेट टीम के कप्तान रोहित शर्मा के साथ स्टार बल्लेबाज विराट कोहली और तेज गेंदबाज जसप्रीत बुमराह को टेस्ट टीम में जगह बनाने के लिए घरेलू मैच खेलने की जरूरत नहीं होगी. बीसीसीआई सचिव जय शाह ने पिछले साल ही यह साफ कर दिया था कि हर एक भारतीय खिलाड़ी के...

title: 日本防衛省:中國山東艦艦載飛機起降約380次
content: 日本 防衛省昨天宣布,7月9日至15日確認中國航空母艦 山東艦 等7艘船艦在太平洋航行,並在沖繩縣宮古島以南約390公里到東南約540公里海域確認山東艦艦載飛機起降共約380次。 共同社中文網報導,防衛省統合幕僚監部(類似國防部參謀本部)指出,7月9日上午7時左右確認了山東艦的航行,之後山東艦繼續在周邊海域活動。截至7月15日為止,確認艦載戰鬥機起降約240次、直升機起降約140次,總共約380次。 日本海上 自衛隊 護衛艦「曙號」、「霧島號」、「神通號」當時監視山東艦相關活動;航空自衛隊戰機當時也緊急升空因應中方戰機飛行。

creator: News18 Hindi
content: नई दिल्‍ली. इनकम टैक्‍स दाखिल (ITR Filing) करने की अंतिम तारीख 31 जुलाई है. अब लोग फटाफट अपनी रिटर्न फाइल कर रहे हैं. इनकम टैक्‍स डिपार्टमेंट ने रिटर्न को वेरिफाई कर आयकरदाताओं के खातों में रिफंड डालने की प्रक्रिया भी शुरू कर दी है. आयकर विभाग के साथ ही अब स्‍कैमर्स भी खूब सक्रिय हो गए हैं. साइबर ठगों ने अब लोगों के बैंक खातों से पैसा उड़ाने के लिए इनकम टैक्‍स रिफंड को अपना हथियार बनाया है. कुछ लोगों को इन ठगों ने फेक मैसेज भेजकर उनके बैंक खाते में सेंध लगाने की कोशिश की है. देशभर से रिफंड...

title: UP Flood: कानपुर में लगातार बढ़ रहा गंगा का जलस्तर, तटवर्ती इलाकों में कटान तेज; गांवों के पास पहुंचा पानी
content: पहाड़ी व मैदानी इलाकों में हुई भारी बारिश के कारण गंगा व अन्य सहायक नदियों का जलस्तर काफी बढ़ गया है। गंगा का जलस्तर बढ़ने से तटवर्ती इलाकों मे ंकटान तेज हो गई है। कई गांवों तक पानी पहुंच गया है। तहसीदार व लेखपाल लोगों को सजग कर रहे हैं। वहीं कानपुर में अटल घाट पर लोगों को सेल्फी लेने से भी रोका जा रहा है। गंगा का जलस्तर बढ़ने से तटवर्ती क्षेत्रों में कटान तेज हो गई है। कई गांवों के पास तक मंगलवार को पानी पहुंच गया। इससे जिला प्रशासन ने सक्रियता बढ़ाई है। एसडीएम सदर प्रखर कुमार सिंह स्वयं टोह...

title: Mavericks star Kyrie Irving breaks left hand in offseason workout, has surgery
creator: The Associated Press
content: Kyrie Irving broke his left hand during an offseason workout and had surgery, and the Dallas Mavericks didn’t provide a timeline for his recovery in an announcement of the injury Tuesday night. Irving and Luka Doncic led the Mavericks to the NBA Finals in their first full season together. Boston won the title series in five games. title: El impactante caso de la influencer latinoamericana condenada por trata de personas y esclavitud

title: MPs who don't go for health check by Nov 11 will be named, says Speaker
content: KUALA LUMPUR: MPs must undergo a mandatory health screening by Nov 11 at the latest, says Dewan Rakyat Speaker Tan Sri Johari Abdul ( pic ). If they fail to do so, their names will be published on the official Parliament website, he added. "This medical screening is compulsory for all MPs and the last date is Monday, Nov 11," he said at the start of Wednesday's (July 17) meeting of the august House. Johari said the necessary information on the health screening was contained in the letter issued...

title: இடஒதுக்கீட்டுக்கு எதிரான மாணவர்கள் போராட்டத்தில் வன்முறை - 6 பேர் பலி; நூற்றுக்கணக்கானோர் படுகாயம்
creator: தினத்தந்தி
content: டாக்கா, பாகிஸ்தான் கட்டுப்பாட்டில் இருந்த வங்காளதேசம் கடந்த 1971-ல் தனிநாடாக சுதந்திரம் பெற்றது. இந்த சுதந்திர போராட்டத்தில் ஆயிரக்கணக்கானோர் தங்களது உயிரை தியாகம் செய்தனர். எனவே சுதந்திர போராட்ட தியாகிகளை போற்றும் வகையில் அவர்களது குடும்பத்தினருக்கு அரசு வேலைவாய்ப்புகளில் 30 சதவீத இடஒதுக்கீடு வழங்கப்பட்டு வருகிறது. ஆனால் இந்த படைவீரர் இடஒதுக்கீடு முறை பாரபட்சமாக உள்ளது என மற்ற மாணவர்கள் குற்றம்சாட்டுகின்றனர். எனவே உரிய தகுதி அடிப்படையில் இடஒதுக்கீட்டை அமல்படுத்த வேண்டும் என அவர்கள்...

title: Tamil Nadu should cooperate on Mekedatu balancing reservoir project, says Karnataka DyCm DK Shivakumar
creator: Express News Service
content: BENGALURU: Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar on Tuesday urged Tamil Nadu to cooperate with Karnataka on the Mekedatu Balancing Reservoir project. It will help Tamil Nadu more than Karnataka, he said. “The water stored in the Mekedatu reservoir helps us release water in a timely manner to Tamil Nadu. There are Kannadigas, Tamilians, and Andhrites in Bengaluru, and drinking water from the project will benefit all of them. I appeal to them to cooperate on this,” he told the media. “Rains have...

title: Women’s Euro 2025: England qualifies, Sweden heads for playoffs after 0-0 draw
content: European champion England withstood a second-half barrage to grab a 0-0 draw with Sweden in Group A3 and qualify for Euro 2025, with the Swedes heading for the playoffs after finishing third in the pool. England finished as runner-up in the group on 11 points, one behind winner France which slumped to a shock 3-1 defeat away to Ireland, which grabbed its first points of the campaign. The Swedes finished with eight points. Knowing it only needed a draw to advance, England contained Sweden well...

title: UIC researchers explore digital tools to personalize depression treatment
content: New research at the University of Illinois Chicago is testing whether digital tools can help predict which patients with depression will benefit from specific treatments and help deliver those treatments to them on demand. Two new grants awarding over $10 million to UIC will help Dr. Jun Ma and colleagues in the College of Medicine investigate the use of a smartphone app, an AI voice assistant and other technologies to diagnose and treat depression. title: New York State eyes changes to $25 billion school aid formula
creator: Cayla Bamberger - New York Daily News (TNS)
content: New York State could soon overhaul how it allocates education funding to each school district. Researchers kicked off a process Tuesday to rework the state’s primary school aid formula, with five public hearings scheduled over the next month in New York City and statewide. The funding stream, known as Foundation Aid, directs $24.9 billion of the $35.9 billion state education package this year to local schools — but is facing mounting criticism that it’s outdated and inequitable. content: पूर्णिया: भिंडी की खेती कर पूर्णिया के किसान अच्छा मुनाफा कमा रहे हैं. किसान हरेंद्र सिंह ने बताया कि वह उन्नत वैरायटी की भिंडी की खेती कर रहे हैं.जिससे शानदार फलन भी हो रहा है और रोजाना 200 किलो तक भिंडी खेत से निकल रहा है और बाजार में अच्छी कीमत पर इसकी बिक्री हो रही है. उन्होंने बताया कि इस सब्जी की बाजार में डिमांड भी अधिक है. कृषि के क्षेत्र में लगातार तकनीक का समावेशन हो रहा है और आजकल के किसान भी खेती करने में अब पिछली चीजों को भूलकर नई-नई खेती और नई-नई वैरायटी का प्रयोग कर रहे हैं....

title: 대만 슬로시티 네트워크, 장흥 벤치마킹 견학
creator: 배상현 기자
content: [장흥=뉴시스] 배상현 기자 = 대만 슬로시티 네트워크가 장흥을 방문해 슬로시티 우수사례 벤치마킹에 나섰다. 17일 장흥군에 따르면 지난 16일 대만 슬로시티 네트워크 관계자 15명은 슬로시티 우수사례 벤치마킹을 위해 군을 방문했다. 이날 방문한 대만 슬로시티 네트워크 관계자는 대만슬로시티 도시 및 후보지역 시장, 관계 공무원으로 구성됐다. 대만 방문단은 이날 김성 장흥군수가 주관한 환영행사에 참석한 후 현장방문을 시작했다. 김...

title: American Junior Legion baseball: Holdingford handles New London-Spicer
creator: Joe Brown
content: SPICER — The top of the third inning got out of hand for the New London-Spicer Junior American Legion baseball team on Tuesday. Hosting Holdingford at Green Lake Diamonds, NLS committed four of its six errors in the top of the third. Add that to Holdingford’s four hits and the visitors tallied 10 runs in the frame. Holdingford went on to win 16-3 in five innings. The loss drops NLS to 5-8 on the season. Trailing 2-0 in the bottom of the first, NLS tied the game with a pair of runs of its own....

title: Abre en TJ primera Escuela de Drag
creator: Khennia  Reyes
content: Tijuana, B.C.- En Tijuana existe la primera Escuela de Drag , la cual tiene el objetivo de que sus alumnos fomenten espacios seguros para las personas sin importar su preferencia sexual. Entre luces, glamour y activismo se impartirán las clases para toda la comunidad mayor de 15 años, el único requisito es ser disciplinado. Alejandro Carbajal es uno de los impulsores de este proyecto de Utopia Talents , el cual en otros países, como Estados Unidos el arte del drag está cobrando relevancia....

title: Orange County Authorities Warn of ‘Hugging’ Jewelry Thieves
creator: Sophie Li
content: Local law enforcement is warning residents of a new robbery trend in Orange County, California—where strangers offer a hug, only to steal jewelry. In one such incident, deputies from the Orange County Sheriff’s Department responded to a home in Rancho Santa Margarita July 2 regarding a robbery. title: ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ಉರಿಗೆ ಅಣ್ಣಾವ್ರ ಸಿನಿಮಾಗೆ ಕೆಟ್ಟ ವಿಮರ್ಶೆ; ರಾಜ್​ಕುಮಾರ್ ಪ್ರತಿಕ್ರಿಯಿಸಿದ್ದ ರೀತಿಗೆ ಎಲ್ಲರೂ ಶಾಕ್
creator: TV9 Web Team
content: ರಾಜ್​ಕುಮಾರ್ ಅವರು ಕನ್ನಡ ಚಿತ್ರರಂಗ ಕಂಡ ಮೇರುನಟ. ಅವರು ಮಾಡುತ್ತಿದ್ದ ಒಳ್ಳೆಯ ಕೆಲಸಗಳು ಸಾಕಷ್ಟಿವೆ. ಅವರು ಚಿತ್ರರಂಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಇದ್ದುಕೊಂಡು ಇತರ ಕಲಾವಿದರನ್ನು, ಇತರ ಸಿನಿಮಾಗಳನ್ನು ಬೆಳೆಸುವ ಕೆಲಸ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಿದ್ದರು. ಯಾರಿಗೂ ಅವರು ಕೆಟ್ಟದನ್ನು ಬಯಸಿದವರಲ್ಲ. ಇದು ಅನೇಕ ಬಾರಿ ಸಾಬೀತಾಗಿದೆ. ಇದಕ್ಕೆ ಹೊಸ ಹೊಸ ನಿದರ್ಶನಗಳು ಸಿಗುತ್ತಲೇ ಇರುತ್ತವೆ. ನಿರ್ದೇಶಕ ಗುರುಪ್ರಸಾಸದ್ ಅವರು ಅಣ್ಣಾವ್ರ ದೊಡ್ಡತನದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಈ ಮೊದಲು ಮಾತನಾಡಿದ್ದರು. ಸಿನಿಮಾಗೆ ಕೆಟ್ಟ ವಿಮರ್ಶೆ ಬರೆದ ವಿಚಾರವನ್ನು ಅಣ್ಣಾವ್ರು ಕೂಲ್ ಆಗಿಯೇ ಹ್ಯಾಂಡಲ್ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದರು. ರಾಜ್​ಕುಮಾರ್ ಅವರು ಸಿನಿಮಾ ರಂಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಹಲವು ಸೂಪರ್ ಹಿಟ್​...

title: Proud of son who was born on Army Day
creator: The Hans India
content: Kolkata: Parents of martyred Army Captain Brijesh Thapa on Tuesday said they are proud of their son who was killed in action while fighting terrorists in Jammu and Kashmir. The deceased officer was born on Army Day which is observed on January 15 in the country. Colonel Bhuwanesh K Thapa (Retd) recalled that his son, a third-generation Army officer in the family, was inspired by him and from his childhood wanted to join the Indian Army. "I feel proud of my son," the retired Army officer said....

title: Ted Cruz pushes the GOP’s immigrant-voting lie deeper into the slime
creator: Philip Bump
content: There is something about Sen. Ted Cruz’s forehead, a knitting of his eyebrows, that gives him a default appearance of sheepishness. Or perhaps this is simply projection, an assumption that someone who made the claim that Cruz (R-Tex.) offered at the Republican convention on Tuesday night would feel at least some remorse about having done so.

title: Forbes ranks Manila as fifth riskiest city for foreign tourists
creator: N/A (Xander Dave Ceballos)
content: Manila has been identified as the fifth riskiest city for foreign tourists, the Forbes Advisor said. title: Comissão do Senado cria grupo de trabalho para discutir regulamentação da tributária
creator: Estadão Conteúdo
content: BRASÍLIA - A Comissão de Assuntos Econômicos (CAE) do Senado decidiu criar um grupo de trabalho para acompanhar a tramitação da regulamentação da reforma tributária . O grupo não terá nenhum poder no relatório da proposta, que ficará sob os cuidados do senador Eduardo Braga (MDB-AM). O trabalho será semelhante ao que aconteceu durante a tramitação da proposta de emenda à Constituição (PEC) que instituiu a reforma tributária. O grupo de trabalho analisará o tema e...

title: ديسانتيس: بايدن يفتقر للقدرات التي تؤهله للاستمرار في منصبه
creator: سكاي نيوز عربية - أبوظبي
content: وأضاف ديسانتيس في كلمة خلال المؤتمر العام للحزب الجمهوري : "يجب أن لا نقبل بسيطرة الأجندة اليسارية على المجتمع الأميركي". وتابع قائلا: " ترامب واجه التحديات التي وضعت في طريقه وهو يمتلك عزما قويا لخدمة الولايات المتحدة". من جانبها، قالت المتنافسة السابقة على ترشيح الحزب الجمهوري نيكي هايلي : "نتفق على أن هدفنا جعل أميركا أكثر قوة وأمنا". وأضافت: "حينما كان الديمقراطيون يحكمون غزت روسيا القرم ثم أوكرانيا ولم يحدث ذلك في عهد ترامب". واختتمت قائلة: "أمامنا فرصة لنستعيد قوة بلدنا...

title: 'ഓപ്പറേഷൻ അനന്ത' അനങ്ങിയില്ല; തലസ്ഥാനത്തെ വെള്ളക്കെട്ട് ഒഴിവാക്കാനായുള്ളത് കോടികൾ; ചെലവഴിക്കാതെ തുക
content: തിരുവനന്തപുരം: തലസ്ഥാന നഗരത്തിലെ വെള്ളക്കെട്ട് പരിഹരിക്കുന്നതിലും മാലിന്യ നിര്‍മ്മാര്‍ജ്ജനത്തിലും സര്‍ക്കാരിനും തിരുവനന്തപുരം കോര്‍പറേഷനും ഉള്ളത് വൻ വീഴ്ച. ഓപ്പറേഷൻ അനന്തയുടെ തുടര്‍ നടപടികളിലും വകുപ്പ് തല ഏകോപനത്തിലും ഉണ്ടായ പാളിച്ചകൾക്ക് പുറമെ വെള്ളക്കെട്ട് പരിഹരിക്കാൻ വകയിരുത്തിയ തുകയിൽ നാലിൽ ഒന്ന് പോലും കോര്‍പറേഷൻ ചെലവഴിച്ചിട്ടില്ല. സർക്കാർ പ്രഖ്യാപിച്ച തെളിനീരൊഴുകും നവകേരളം പദ്ധതിയിലും ഇല്ല പാർവതിപുത്തനാറിന്റെയും ആമയിഴഞ്ചാൻ തോടിന്റെയും പേരില്ല. ആമയിഴഞ്ചാൻ ആകെ 12 കിലോമീറ്ററാണുള്ളത്....

content: 잠실진주아파트 등 최근 건설공사비 증액으로 갈등이 불거진 정비사업에 서울시가 조정자로 나서 조합·시공자 합의를 이끌어냈다. 17일 서울시에 따르면 정비사업 코디네이터(코디)를 파견한 현장은 잠실진주아파트와 청담삼익아파트, 대조1구역과 행당7구역, 방화6구역, 미아3구역, 안암2구역 등 6곳이다. 코디는 도시행정·정비, 법률·세무·회계 분야 전문가로 구성돼 정비사업 분쟁이 발생하면 서울시·자치구·갈등당사자와 협의체를 구성하고 의견을...

title: CM Pinarayi Vijayan convenes meet to resolve Tvm canal woes
content: THIRUVANANTHAPURAM: Following the tragic death of cleaning labourer Joy in the Amayizhanjan canal in the capital, chief minister Pinarayi Vijayan has convened a high-level meeting on Thursday to resolve the issues related exclusively to the canal. The meeting will be attended by ministers in charge of local self-government, public works, labour, food, railways , health and water resources departments. The MLAs representing the areas through which the canal is passing, Thiruvananthapuram mayor,...

title: Sapele residents recount experiences in fire incident
creator: Alphonsus Agborh
content: Mysterious fire that engulfed a large building on Uko road in the Gana area of Sapele, Delta State has left several persons counting their loses. Shops and over 40 rooms were destroyed as the building was completely razed down. According to witnesses, the inferno began around 1:00 a.m. and engulfed the entire structure. One of the victims, Jane Adeboye, who is pregnant said she was still in shock. “I only have these clothes on my back now. I don’t know where my children and I will go. I’m just...

title: [포토] 김무열, '천의 얼굴을 가진 배우'
creator: 변성현
content: 배우 김무열이 17일 오전 서울 종로 JW 메리어트 동대문 스퀘어 서울에서 열린 넷플릭스 '스위트홈 시즌3' (연출 이응복, 박소현) 제작발표회에 참석해 포토타임을 갖고 있다. 송강, 이진욱, 이시영, 고민시, 이도현, 진영, 유오성, 김무열, 김시아 등이 출연하는 '스위트홈 시즌3'는 괴물화의 끝이자 신인류의 시작을 비로소 맞이하게 된 세상, 괴물과 인간의 모호한 경계 사이에서 선택의 기로에 놓인 이들의 더 처절하고 절박해진 사투를 그린...

title: 부천시체육회장, '女팀장 직원 성추행' 사과..."분리 조치"
creator: 정일형 기자
content: [부천=뉴시스] 정일형 기자 = 송수봉 부천시체육회장은 17일 '팀장 갑질 및 성희롱 사건'과 관련해 "피해자에 대한 2차 피해가 발생하지 않도록 조치를 취하겠다"며 공식 사과했다. 송 회장은 이날 오전 부천시청 브리핑실에서 기자회견을 열고 "피해자와 가해자의 완벽한 분리조치를 체육회의 구조적 한계로 신속하고 완전히 취하지 못한 점에 대해 깊이 반성하고 있다"며 "빠른 시일내에 피해자와 가해자를 분리해 2차 피해가 발생되지 않도록 조치를...

title: 8 Korean golfers set to take final shot at major glory in 2024

content: Korean golfer Tom Kim hits off the fourth tee during the first round of the Rocket Mortgage Classic golf tournament at Detroit Country Club, in Detroit, June 27. title: Cho Jung-seok shines in middling comedy 'Pilot'
creator: yonhap@koreatimes.co.kr(KoreaTimes)
content: Actor Cho Jung-seok stands in front of a photo wall during a press conference in Gwangjin District, Seoul, June 26. Yonhap Set against the vibrant backdrop of Korea, "Pilot" is a pleasant but uninspired comedy that fails to deliver the side-splitting laughs it seems to promise. A remake of the Swedish film "Cockpit," the Korean flick follows the career crash-landing of Han Jung-woo (played by Cho Jung-seok), a star pilot fired for a sexist remark. Desperate to reclaim his professional life...

title: Samsung Electronics launches energy management service for Tesla vehicles
creator: yonhap@koreatimes.co.kr(KoreaTimes)
content: A person enters a headquarters of Samsung Electronics in Seocho District, Seoul, July 8. Yonhap Samsung Electronics has launched an energy management service for electric vehicles of Tesla in the United States as part of their strategic partnership aimed at enhancing connectivity at home, industry sources said Wednesday. Samsung Electronics' SmartThings Energy platform is now available for Tesla drivers in the U.S., allowing them to monitor and control the charging status of their EV batteries...

title: N. Korea urges all-out efforts to minimize damage from torrential downpours
creator: yonhap@koreatimes.co.kr(KoreaTimes)
content: This file photo shows North Hwanghae Province in North Korea, July 7. Yonhap North Korea on Wednesday renewed its call for efforts to minimize potential damage from torrential downpours, urging party officials and residents to thoroughly prepare for it. North Korea is expected to be hit by heavy downpours Wednesday and Thursday, with up to 250 millimeters of rain expected in some areas, including the western province of Hwanghae, according to South Korea's weather agency. North Korea called on...

title: Three trapped as lift at Medical College Hospital in Thiruvananthapuram malfunctions again
creator: Express News Service
content: THIRUVANANTHAPURAM : A day after a patient was rescued after being stuck inside a lift at the Government Medical College Hospital in Thiruvananthapuram for 42 hours, another lift malfunction trapped three at the hospital. The incident happened on Tuesday afternoon when a woman doctor, a patient and a bystander were going from the emergency ward to the CT Scan section in the lift. The patient was on a stretcher. When the lift doors could not be opened, the doctor pressed the emergency bell and...

title: 트럼프 경호 실패에 美우익들, “女경호원 없애야”
creator: 매일경제
content: #3명의 여성 경호원이 도널드 트럼프 전 미국 대통령을 스포츠 유틸리티 차량(SUV)에 태우는 영상이 소셜미디어(SNS) X(엑스)에 올라 왔다. 미국의 우익 정치 평론가 맷 월시는 이에 대해 “미국의 비밀경호국(SS)에는 여성이 없어야 한다”고 밝혔다. 그는 “(트럼프 전 대통령을 경호원들은) 최고여야 한다. 해당 분야에서 최고는 여성이 아니다”라고 주장했다. 16일(현지시간) 영국 파이낸셜타임스(FT)는 미국에서 SS가 ‘트럼프 암살 시도’를 막는 데...

title: 郭品超在台灣「靈魂沒回家」 苦苓:難怪到中國招魂
content: 郭品超(右)為尋根在中國山東省見到85歲三舅公時含淚說:「我回到中國台灣的時候,不見得靈魂會回家。」引發熱議。(翻攝自微博) 林南谷/核稿編輯 〔娛樂頻道/綜合報導〕47歲藝人郭品超2004年因偶像劇《鬥魚》爆紅,近年事業重心轉往中國,近日被翻出參加山東衛視節目《行進中國黃河篇》片段,郭品超在節目中說:「我回到中國台灣時,不見得靈魂會回家。」更說基因是騙不了人。 相關新聞:汪怡昕聞關鍵字開罵郭品超:中國台灣輪不到你這個戲子 請繼續往下閱讀... 郭品超說詞,讓知名作家苦苓不滿在臉書寫下:「原來郭品超在台灣的時候都沒有靈魂—也就是行屍走肉的意思。」接著酸他難怪要到中國「招魂」,「希望不管將來變人還是變鬼,他都像是過了奈何橋,千萬不要再回來了。」 相關新聞:Threads爆紅 郭品超陳年影片遭炎上:根在中國靈魂沒回家 日前郭品超參加節目《行進中國大運河篇》聲稱自己好像「一直都在漂泊」,出生在台灣,爸爸是山東人,曾透過節目千里尋根回到老家山東,與一群從沒見過的陌生人相見,但那些人卻是他的家人,感嘆說:「血濃於水是真的。」接著又說:「我回到中國台灣的時候......」...

title: Bub Carrington Goes Off For 20 Second-Half Points in Wizards Game
creator: George Michalowski, Pittsburgh Sports Now
content: On Tuesday night, Bub Carrington shined for the Washington Wizards in the team’s third NBA Summer League game. After a quiet first half, Carrington caught fire in the latter frame, scoring 20 points in the half. He went 6 for 16 from the field, including 3 for 6 from three-point range. He hit all five free-throw attempts, grabbed three rebounds, and tallied five assists while turning the ball over just one time. Trailing by five with less than ten seconds to play, Carrington added his final two...

title: Second PUC Exam 3 Result: ದ್ವಿತೀಯ ಪಿಯು ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆ 3: ಶೇ.23.73 ಫಲಿತಾಂಶ
content: ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು (ಜು.17): ಕರ್ನಾಟಕ ಶಾಲಾ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆ ಮತ್ತು ಮೌಲ್ಯನಿರ್ಣಯ ಮಂಡಳಿಯು ದ್ವಿತೀಯ ಪಿಯುಸಿ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆ-3ರ ಫಲಿತಾಂಶವನ್ನು ಪ್ರಕಟಿಸಿದ್ದು, ಶೇ.23.73 ವಿದ್ಯಾರ್ಥಿಗಳು ತೇರ್ಗಡೆ ಹೊಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆ-3ಕ್ಕೆ ನೋಂದಣಿ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದ 76,005 ಮಂದಿಯಲ್ಲಿ 25,466 ಮಂದಿ ಹಾಜರಾಗಿದ್ದು, 17,901 (ಶೇ.23.73) ಮಂದಿ ಉತ್ತೀರ್ಣರಾಗಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಕಲಾ ವಿಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಶೇ.21.71 ವಾಣಿಜ್ಯ ವಿಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಶೇ.23.58 ಮತ್ತು ವಿಜ್ಞಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಶೇ.27.06 ಮಂದಿ ಪಾಸ್ ಆಗಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಜೂ.28ರಿಂದ ಜು.5ರ ವರೆಗೆ ಒಟ್ಟು 248 ಕೇಂದ್ರಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಪರೀಕ್ಷೆ ನಡೆಸಲಾಗಿತ್ತು. ಮಂಗಳವಾರ ಮಧ್ಯಾಹ್ನ 3 ಗಂಟೆಗೆ ಮಂಡಳಿ...

title: Wings star Satou Sabally to represent Germany at 2024 Paris Olympics
content: DALLAS — The Dallas Wings revealed Monday that Satou Sabally will be on Germany's roster for the 2024 Summer Olympics. Sabally has yet to play in a game for the Wings in 2024 after undergoing a shoulder procedure during the offseason. But, it looks as though she will get the chance to represent her nation on the world stage despite being currently sidelined. Although the Wings hold one of the worst records in the WNBA, her team is eager to welcome her back to the hardwood after the Olympic...

title: Viral Video: బాబోయ్.. బాత్రూమ్ లో వేసుకునే చెప్పులకు ఇంత ధర?.. ఓ కువైట్ షాపుపై విరుచుకుపడుతున్న భారతీయ నెటిజన్లు.. !
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy

title: 광주연구원 "무등산 보전 위해 정상부 군부대 등 이전 필요"
creator: 류형근 기자

content: FILE PHOTO: The logo of America Movil is pictured on the wall at a reception area in the company's corporate offices, in Mexico City, Mexico January 25, 2022. title: Delhi BJP seeks special Assembly session over power purchase pact
creator: Ujwal Jalali
content: NEW DELHI: Delhi BJP MLAs on Tuesday wrote a letter to Assembly Speaker Ramniwas Goel demanding a special session of the Assembly to discuss power purchase agreement charge (PPAC) and other surcharges. The letter was a part of the campaign run by the Delhi BJP against the excessive PPAC, pension surcharge, and other surcharges imposed on consumers allegedly by the Delhi government. At a press conference after the meeting, the BJP MLAs said that they urged the Speaker to hold a special session...

title: Возле Харькова заметили самолет британских ВВС
content: МОСКВА, 17 июл — РИА Новости. Учебно-пилотажный самолет Grob G120TP-A Prefect T1 ВВС Великобритании заметили над территорией Украиной, в частности у Харькова, свидетельствуют данные сервиса Flightradar . По данным сервиса, самолет появился во вторник в 18.26 мск в Кировоградской области Украины. Он пролетал над разными областями Украины, в том числе Харьковской, Сумской, Николаевской и Черниговской. Также самолет был замечен над подконтрольных ВСУ частями ДНР и Запорожской области ....

title: പുലി കുറുകെച്ചാടി: ബൈക്ക് നിയന്ത്രണം വിട്ട് മറിഞ്ഞു, വ്യാപാരിക്ക് പരിക്ക്; സംഭവം നല്ലന്നൂരില്‍
content: വടുവന്‍ചാല്‍ (വയനാട്): മൂപ്പൈനാട് നല്ലന്നൂരില്‍ പുലി ബൈക്കിനു കുറുകെച്ചാടി ഒരാള്‍ക്ക് വീണുപരിക്കേറ്റു. നല്ലന്നൂര്‍ പുളിക്കായത്ത് ജോസിനാണ് കാലിന് പരിക്കേറ്റത്. തിങ്കളാഴ്ച രാത്രി എട്ടുമണിയോടെയായിരുന്നു സംഭവം. നല്ലന്നൂര്‍ പുന്നമറ്റത്തില്‍ ജോയിയുടെ തൊഴുത്തില്‍ക്കെട്ടിയ പശുക്കിടാവിനെയും രാത്രിയില്‍ പുലി ആക്രമിച്ചു. മൂപ്പൈനാട് ഗ്രാമപ്പഞ്ചായത്തിലെ നല്ലന്നൂര്‍ പ്രദേശം ഏറെക്കാലമായി പുലിപ്പേടിയിലാണ്. കുറച്ചുമാസങ്ങളായി വലിയഭീതിയിലാണിവര്‍. രണ്ടുമാസത്തിനിടെ ഏഴുപശുക്കളെയാണ് പുലി പിടിച്ചത്. ഇതില്‍...

title: 證交法「加薪條款」三讀通過 業界卻掀反彈聲浪
content: 立法院昨日三讀通過證交法第14條的「 加薪 條款」,各產業的上市櫃公司儘管表面不動聲色,但檯面下已炸鍋。一位不具名的金融業高層指出,最大的問題,在於公司賺錢是去年的,但倘若今年 景氣 急轉直下,或是 資本適足率 不足,還要由證交法硬性規定得拿去年的獲利為員工今年加薪,並不合理,他反問:「照這個邏輯,那麼如果公司虧錢,員工是否也應該減薪?」 高層指出,包括員工紅利、獎金這些,企業當然會發給員工,但證交法的加薪條款,強調的是對全體員工的全面加薪,人事費用負擔就會大得多,尤其是金融業這幾年看似全體獲利亮眼,但資源在大小機構之間分配並不平均,有些業者由於資本適足率的要求,帳上現金流還有待加強,現在又多了強制加薪的負擔。 高科技業者則是景氣循環不確定性高,高層指出,現在的榮景不會一直都是如此,往往景氣循環變動劇烈,倘若今年景氣急轉直下,甚至今年公司虧錢,還因為去年獲利得在今年為員工加薪,負擔加重。 關於證交法的「加薪條款」修正案,當初證期局在朝野黨團協商時,即表達不贊成,證期局當時指出,現行的公司法235之1條,就已對企業加薪作出規定,不需要在證交法再疊床架屋。...

content: नई दिल्ली. इंडियन क्रिकेटर हार्दिक पांड्या और उनकी मॉडल पत्नी नताशा स्टेनकोविक, पिछले काफी समय से सुर्खियों में हैं. दोनों के उलझे रिश्ते के बीच तलाक की खबरों ने जोर पकड़ा है. लंबे वक्त से अटकलें लगाई जा रही हैं कि दोनों के बीच कुछ तो गड़बड़ है और इसलिए दोनों कई महीनों से अलग-अलग रहे हैं. हार्दिक के भाई के एक पोस्ट के बाद दोनों के तलाक की खबरों ने और जोर पकड़ा और फिर मिस्ट्री गर्ल ने क्रिकेटर की लाइफ में आना, तलाक की खबरों को और हवा दे दी. नताशा ने हाल ही में लगेज बैग के साथ एक क्रिप्टिक लिखा,...

title: АО "ГЛОНАСС" и "Радар ммс" будут вместе развивать технологии связи для БПЛА
content: ЮЖНО-САХАЛИНСК, 17 июля. /ТАСС/. Научно-производственное предприятие "Радар ммс" и АО "ГЛОНАСС" договорились о совместном развитии технологий связи и высокоточного позиционирования для ускорения масштабирования беспилотной грузовой авиалогистики в России. Соответствующее соглашение подписано на площадке проектно-образовательного интенсива "Архипелаг" на Сахалине, сообщили ТАСС в пресс-службе АО "ГЛОНАСС". Соглашение о стратегическом партнерстве подписали исполнительный директор "Радар ммс"...

title: Байден сообщил о готовности отказаться от выборов в случае проблем со здоровьем
creator: Максим Попов
content: Tекст: Максим Попов «Если бы врачи сообщили мне о наличии какого-либо заболевания, я бы, вероятно, принял решение отказаться от участия в предвыборной гонке», – приводит ТАСС слова Байдена. Ранее Байден говорил, что готов покинуть гонку только по воле Бога. Напомним, после дебатов с Дональдом Трампом группа влиятельных демократов попросила Байдена сняться с выборов.

title: NBA moves a big step closer to finalizing new 11-year media rights deals
creator: Tim Reynolds
content: The NBA’s Board of Governors approved the league’s next media rights deals with Disney, NBC and Amazon Prime Video at its meeting Tuesday, moving the league one giant step closer to finalizing the 11-year agreements that will be worth about $76 billion. Now comes the next, and possibly final, step: seeing if Warner Bros. Discovery will match one of the deals in an effort to extend a relationship with the NBA that dates to the late 1980s. WBD has five days to match, that clock starting to run...

title: Japan to boost jet fuel production and imports amid tourism boom
content: TOKYO: Japan plans to increase jet fuel production and imports to address a pick up in demand from flights amid a boom in tourism, according to a draft government plan presented on Tuesday. The initiative aims to tackle a recent jet fuel shortage affecting commercial flights, which has hindered the expansion of international flight capacity and the introduction of new routes. Tourism to Japan bounced back after visa-free travel resumed in late 2022 following strict Covid-19 border controls,...

title: Stock Tips : આ કંપનીએ માત્ર 90 દિવસમાં રોકાણકારોના નાણાં બમણા કર્યા, એપ્રિલમાં કંપનીનો IPO આવ્યો હતો
creator: TV9 Gujarati
content: ભારતી હેક્સાકોમ(Bharti Hexacom) તેના IPO પછી રોકાણકારોને ઉત્તમ વળતર આપી રહી છે. હવે નિષ્ણાતો પણ કંપનીના શેરની કામગીરી અંગે બુલિશ જણાય છે. મંગળવારે કંપનીના શેરમાં ઉછાળો જોવા મળ્યો છે. કંપનીનો શેર 9 ટકાથી વધુ વધીને ઈન્ટ્રા-ડે હાઈ પર પહોંચ્યો હતો. BSEમાં ભારતી હેક્સાકોમનો શેર રૂપિયા 1123ના સ્તરે ખૂલ્યો હતો. કંપનીનો ઈન્ટ્રા-ડે હાઈ રૂપિયા 1165 છે. જે સોમવારના બંધની સરખામણીમાં 9 ટકાથી વધુ છે. તમને જણાવી દઈએ કે, કંપનીના શેર કારોબારની સમાપ્તિ સમયે 76.05 રૂપિયા અથવા વધારા સાથે BSEમાં રૂપિયા 1141ના સ્તરે...

title: USWNT heads to Olympics with a noticeable lack of goals - what we learned from U.S. send-off games
content: After two friendlies in blazing heat and humid weather, the U.S. women’s national team is headed to France for the Paris Olympics. With a 1-0 win against Mexico and a dreary scoreless draw against Costa Rica, head coach Emma Hayes’ plan of attack is still unclear. The game against Costa Rica in particular showed what not to do with the U.S. registering 26 shots (12 on goal) and 80% possession. title: 焦點股》欣興:受惠GB200 內外資同步大買
content: 欣興董事長曾子章看好下半年營運,並預估明年會更好。(記者卓怡君攝) 〔記者卓怡君/台北報導〕IC載板龍頭欣興(3037)受惠AI風潮,加上蘋果新機即將上市,高階ABF載板出貨有望大增,外資看好欣興是輝達GB200伺服器系列主要受惠者,近5個交易日內外資同步買進,外資大買2.94萬張,投信買超3533張,推升欣興股價連日大漲,創2022年5月以來新高。 欣興股價早盤開低後,出現一波急拉,截至10:19分左右,股價上漲7.58%,暫報213元,成交量放大至4.47萬張,已超過昨日全天成交量。 請繼續往下閱讀... 欣興董事長曾子章認為,第三季進入傳統旺季,欣興下半年營運有望優於上半年,AI將是未來重要成長動能,在5G、AI需求成長帶動下,營運有望加速從谷底回升,重新恢復成長,明年在AI應用擴大下,成長性將會比今年更好。 一手掌握經濟脈動 點我訂閱自由財經Youtube頻道 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

Google invests in Indian open-source app that rivals Ola and Uber: Report
content: Google has invested in Moving Tech, the parent company of the Indian open-source ridesharing app Namma Yatri. The Bengaluru-based startup raised $11 million in a pre-Series A funding round, co-led by Blume Ventures and Antler. Google, committed to investing $10 billion in India, participated in this round, according to a report by TechCrunch. Namma Yatri operates on the Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC), a government-backed initiative to democratise e-commerce in India. Unlike Uber and...

title: Tangedco: Interest payment on loans increased 259% in 10 years
creator: S Guruvanmikanathan
content: CHENNAI: As the decision to increase electricity tariff by 4.83% for all users from July 1 has evoked strong criticism and reaction, the state government on Tuesday defended the decision, saying that the annual interest payment on Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation’s (Tangedco) loans alone has increased 259% from Rs 4,588 crore in 2011-12 to Rs 16,511 crore in 2021-22. The power utility’s total debt has tripled from Rs 43,493 crore in 2011-12 to Rs 1,59,823 crore in 10 years...

title: Anaheim Agrees to $2.75 Million Settlement With Angels Baseball Over Failed Stadium Sale
creator: Jill McLaughlin
content: Anaheim has agreed to settle a claim filed by Angels Baseball ownership after the city abandoned the sale of Angel Stadium, city officials announced July 15. In June 2022, the Major League team asked for $5 million plus legal fees after the city abandoned a $320 million deal made in 2020 for the sale of the 151-acre stadium to team owner Arte Moreno and his family. The original sale agreement included a provision that Mr. Moreno’s company—called SRB Management—could recoup $5 million in...

title: Teen reported missing after swimming in Lake Erie found dead: Police
creator: Canadian Press
content: CENTRAL ELGIN, Ont. — A teenager who was reported missing on Sunday after going swimming in Lake Erie has been found dead. Ontario Provincial Police said the victim was a 14-year-old from London, Ont. They’re crediting a member of the public with spotting the missing swimmer. Police said a swimmer was reported missing on Sunday afternoon off the main beach of Port Stanley, south of London. creator: 매일경제
content: 영국 반독점 당국이 마이크로소프트(MS)와 인플렉션 AI 간의 협력이 사실상 인수합병인지 여부를 조사할 예정이다. 16일(현지시간) 파이낸셜타임스(FT)에 따르면 이날 영국 경쟁시장청(CMA)은 인플렉션 AI 최고경영자(CEO) 및 직원 영입에 대한 예비조사를 마치고 공식 조사에 착수한다고 밝혔다. CMA는 “(MS의) 인플렉션 AI의 전 직원 고용 및 인플렉션 AI와 연계된 합의로의 진입에 대한 충분한 정보가 모여 조사에 착수하게 됐다”고 밝혔다....

title: Ex-Tamil Nadu minister MR Vijayabhaskar arrested in Rs 100 crore land grab case
content: Listen to Story The Tamil Nadu Crime Branch CID (CB-CID) arrested former state minister MR Vijayabhaskar from a hideout in Kerala on Tuesday in a Rs 100 crore land grab case. Vijayabhaskar, the AIADMK leader and former transport minister in the previous Edappadi Palaniswami government, faces charges of forging documents, kidnapping, assault, and criminal intimidation to grab 22 acres of land worth Rs 100 crore in Karur. Five special teams were formed to arrest Vijayabhaskar after the Karur...

title: X本社、テキサスに移転 カリフォルニア新法に反発(共同通信)

title: Tragedia en Ayacucho: Contraloría habría advertido sobre estado de la vía Los Libertadores
creator: Redacción PERÚ21
content: Una nueva tragedia vuelve a teñir de sangre la Vía de Los Libertadores, en Ayacucho . Un bus interprovincial de la empresa Molina sufrió un despiste y cayó a un abismo en el sector de Rumichaca, dejando 29 personas fallecidas y varios heridos. Este nuevo accidente se da a tan solo meses de otra tragedia similar en la misma vía, en la que falleció el congresista Édgar Alarcón junto a otras 16 personas. Esta situación enciende las alarmas sobre la situación de esta importante carretera....

title: Bento junta-se a Cristiano Ronaldo no Al Nassr
creator: online@record.pt (Record)
content: O guarda-redes Bento, que chegou a ser alvo do Benfica, vai reforçar do Al Nassr, equipa de Luís Castro, Cristiano Ronaldo e Otávio. O Athletico Paranaense chegou a acordo com o clube saudita, que vai pagar 18 M€ pelo internacional brasileiro de 25 anos. Bento já foi autorizado a deixar o Brasil para fazer os testes médicos e assinar contrato.

title: Tribunal de apelación anula adopción de una huérfana afgana por un marine estadounidense
content: Un tribunal de apelación de Virginia dictaminó el martes que nunca se debió haber concedido a un marine estadounidense la adopción de una huérfana de guerra afgana y anuló la orden de custodia en la que se había basado para criar a la niña durante casi tres años. La decisión marcó un importante punto de inflexión en una reñida batalla por la custodia que tiene ramificaciones internacionales mucho mayores que el destino de una niña. title: Oil Halts Run of Losses on Estimate for US Crude Inventory Draw
creator: Bloomberg News
content: (Bloomberg) — Oil steadied after a three-day drop as an industry estimate pointed to another decline in US crude stockpiles, countering concerns about a lackluster demand outlook in China. Brent traded just below $84 a barrel while West Texas Intermediate was near $81. US crude stockpiles shrank by 4.4 million barrels last week, the American Petroleum Institute reported, according to people familiar with the figures. Official inventory data comes later Wednesday, and if confirmed, that would be...

title: Many AAP leaders miffed over corruption join Congress: Devender Yadav
creator: Ashish Srivastava
content: NEW DELHI: Ahead of the Assembly elections, many AAP leaders joined Delhi Congress along with their supporters on Tuesday. Delhi Pradesh Congress Committee (DPCC) President Devender Yadav welcomed a large number of AAP workers from Timarpur Assembly seat into the Congress fold by offering them the party scarf at the DPCC office, the party said. While the party did not reveal the names of those who switched over, senior party leaders said around 15-16 influential AAP politicians were among them....

title: Polisen väntas göra miljardförlust
content: Nyheter / Polismyndigheten TT Publicerad 04.33 väntas gå back med över en miljard kronor i år, rapporterar SR Ekot. – Vi har gått lite för snabbt i vår budgettakt i förhållande till vad budgeten medger, säger ekonomidirektören Caroline Viper till radion. title: ¡Oficial! Jaime Lozano deja el timón de la Selección Mexicana
creator: Patrizio Caro
content: CIUDAD DE MÉXICO.- La Federación Mexicana de Futbol (FMF) confirmó este martes la salida de Jaime Lozano como director técnico de la Selección Nacional Mayor, poniendo fin a un ciclo de dos años al frente del Tricolor. title: Homem com fuzil AK-47 e máscara de esqui é preso perto de convenção republicana nos Estados Unidos
content: O policiamento foi reforçado no entorno da convenção após o , no sábado (13), na Pensilvânia. O republicano sofreu um ferimento na orelha, mas manteve a participação no evento partidário. O autor do atentado foi morto. O homem que foi preso nos arredores da convenção republicana foi parado por policiais e agentes que monitoram a região. Durante a abordagem, os agentes encontraram o fuzil dentro de uma mochila. title: દુનિયાનો સૌથી ખતરનાર બીચ, જ્યાં થઈ રહ્યા છે રેકોર્ડબ્રેક મૃત્યુ
content: સમુદ્રની મધ્યમાં જોખમ સમજી શકાય તેવું છે. પરંતુ શું તે બીચ પર પણ ખતરો હોઈ શકે છે? શું કોઈપણ બીચને સૌથી ખતરનાક બીચનું બિરુદ આપી શકાય? હા, અમેરિકાનો એક બીચ ત્યાંનો સૌથી ખતરનાક અથવા ઘાતક બીચ કહેવાય છે. આ એટલા માટે છે કારણ કે આ સુંદર જગ્યાએ મોટી સંખ્યામાં લોકો મરી રહ્યા છે. કુદરતી જોખમો અહીં યથાવત છે. તેમ છતાં લોકો અહીં આવવાનું બંધ કરતા નથી જેના કારણે તેમની સુરક્ષા ચિંતાનું કારણ બની જાય છે. સેન્ટ્રલ ફ્લોરિડાના પૂર્વ કિનારે આવેલા આ લોકપ્રિય બીચની સુંદરતા અને રેતાળ દેખાવ હોવા છતાં, તેના કિનારા અને...

title: Doda Encounter: Captain among 4 soldiers martyred
creator: The Hans India
content: Jammu: Four army personnel, including a captain, died after being injured in a gunfight with heavily armed terrorists in Doda district of Jammu and Kashmir, officials said on Tuesday while reinforcements were rushed in to track and neutralize the militants. Those martyred in the encounter have been identified as Captain Brijesh Thapa, Naik D Rajesh, Sepoy Bijendra and Sepoy Ajay, they said. content: Real estate developer Sergio Pino, one of the country’s largest Hispanic residential builders, died by suicide Tuesday morning after FBI agents arrived at his Cocoplum home amid what the bureau called a “murder for hire” investigation related to threats made against his estranged wife, Tatiana Pino. title: 「小蜜蜂」抓欠債車踢鐵板 前後包夾債務人兄弟檔被起訴
content: 高雄王姓男子將轎車典當給當舖,疑因未按時還款, 當鋪 委託俗稱「小蜜蜂」的黃姓 兄弟 檔尋車,前年10月間,黃姓兄弟見王男將車子停在高雄青年一路、仁智街口,一前一後包夾,王男隨即報警對兩人提告,檢方調查後,認定即便黃男受託尋車,也無法妨礙王男自由離去權利,依強制罪嫌將黃男2人起訴。 檢警調查,王男因缺錢,2021年5月將車輛以23萬元典當給當鋪,事後疑因未按時還款,當鋪找來擔任小蜜蜂的黃姓兄弟檔「尋車」。 前年10月15日下午,黃姓兄弟檔在高雄市區繞行時,在青年一路、仁智街口找到當鋪列管的協尋車輛,於是分別以兩輛車夾在王男轎車左右。 王男到場時,黃男馬上秀出當票及本票,稱要拖走轎車,王男企圖離開,黃姓兄弟又站在轎車後方,還將其中一輛車停在王男車輛後方擋路。 王男不滿,馬上秀出還款紀錄,稱自己有定時還款,但黃男2人卻不理,稱等當鋪人員到場再說,氣得王男報警對黃姓兄弟檔提告強制罪。 檢警偵辦時,哥哥供稱當天有跟王男說轎車是當舖協尋車,要等當舖人員到場才能讓他離開,弟弟則稱當天是與哥哥約好碰面,他是看到王男要倒車離開,才停在後面等候車位。...

title: Chandani Chowk : चांदणी चौकात पादचाऱ्यांसाठी १०० मीटरचा लोखंडी पादचारी मार्ग उभारणार
creator: सकाळ वृत्तसेवा
content: मयूर कॅालनी - राष्ट्रीय महामार्ग प्राधिकरणाकडून चांदणी चौकात लवकरच पादचारी मार्ग (फूट ओव्हर ब्रिज) उभारला जाणार असून, त्यासाठी निविदा प्रक्रीया पूर्ण झाली आहे. चांदणी चौकातील ‘एसटी’चा नवीन बस थांबा ते इराणी कॅफे बावधन, असा १०० मीटरचा लोखंडी पादचारी मार्ग असणार आहे. पादचारी मार्गाचे काम कोल्हापूर येथील ‘एमडी इंफ्र’ कंपनीला देण्यात आले असून, राष्ट्रीय महामार्ग प्राधिकरण आणि ‘एमडी इंफ्र’ यांच्यातील शेवटच्या टप्प्यातील कराराचे काम सुरू आहे. पुढील महिन्यात पादचारी पूल उभारण्याचे काम सुरू होईल, अशी...

title: இன்று சனிக்கிழமை அட்டவணைப்படி மெட்ரோ ரெயில்கள் இயக்கம்
creator: தினத்தந்தி
content: சென்னை, மொகரம் பண்டிகையை ஒட்டி இன்று (ஜூலை 17) சனிக்கிழமை அட்டவணைப் படி மெட்ரோ ரெயில்கள் இயக்கப்படும் என சென்னை மெட்ரோ ரெயில் நிறுவனம் அறிவித்துள்ளது. அதன்படி, நெரிசல் மிகு நேரமான காலை 8 மணி முதல் காலை 11 மணி வரையிலும், மாலை 5 மணி முதல் இரவு 8 மணி வரையிலும் 6 நிமிட இடைவெளியில் ரெயில்கள் இயக்கப்படும்.அதேபோல, அதிகாலை 5 மணி முதல் காலை 8 மணி வரையிலும், காலை 11 மணி முதல் மாலை 5 மணி வரையிலும் 7 நிமிட இடைவெளியில் ரெயில்கள் இயக்கப்படும் என்று தெரிவிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது.

title: તપાસ:ખારવાવાડમાં રહેતા યુવકનો ગળેફાંસો ખાઈ આપઘાત
content: પોરબંદરના ખારવાવાડ વિસ્તારમાં આવેલ મીઠી મસ્જિદ વિસ્તારમાં રહેતા એક યુવકે ગળેફાંસો ખાઈ આપઘાત કરી લીધો હતો.આ ઘટના બાદ મૃતક યુવકના મૃતદેહ પી.એમ. માટે પોરબંદરની સરકારી હોસ્પિટલમાં ખસેડવામાં આવ્યા હતા.યુવકના આપઘાતને લઈને પરિવારમાં શોક વ્યાપી ગયો હતો. પોરબંદર જિલ્લામાં આપઘાતના બનાવો સમયાંતરે સામે આવતા હોય છે. પોરબંદર શહેરના ખારવાવાડ મીઠી મસ્જિદ વિસ્તારમાં રહેતા ગોહેલ હિતેશ કાનજીભાઈ(ઉ.37)નામના યુવકે તેમના ઘરે ગળેફાંસો ખાઈ આપઘાત કરી લીધો હતો.આ ઘટનાની જાણ પરિવારના સભ્યોને થતા મૃતક યુવકના મૃતદેહ...

title: NBA moves a big step closer to finalizing new 11-year media rights deals
creator: Tim Reynolds The Associated Press
content: LAS VEGAS (AP) — The NBA’s Board of Governors approved the league’s next media rights deals with Disney, NBC and Amazon Prime Video at its meeting Tuesday, moving the league one giant step closer to finalizing the 11-year agreements that will be worth about $76 billion. title: 可不可口水加料苦主現身「那杯是我爸喝的」...網見女店員1特徵怒:沒口水也不敢買
content: 「 可不可熟成紅茶 」14日爆出食安事件,一名新竹關埔分店女店員因不滿顧客在打烊前訂飲料,先是在手上吐口水,再徒手攪拌白玉珍珠,並讓同事錄下過程傳到網路上,引發各界撻伐。有網友指出,事件爆發後,將手邊的飲料跟影片中左上角的單號進行比對,發現自己就是苦主,也透露「那杯白玉紅茶是我爸喝的」。 該名網友16日在Threads 發文 ,表示自己當天原本要去門市買飲料,但時間上來不及到店面,只能叫熊貓外送。原PO表示,15日晚上看到新聞後,發現時間點和門市吻合,核對飲料杯上與影片中的單號,發現苦主就是自己和家人。原PO一共點了3杯飲料,透露自己和家人都已經喝完了,「雖然那杯白玉紅茶是我爸喝的,應該不是每杯都有口水吧」。 原PO提到,事發後已接到可不可督導來電關心狀況,除了大讚業者處理事情的態度讓人很舒服,也覺得關埔店店長和督導都很無辜,並抱怨該名吐口水的女店員「道歉文裡面怎麼沒跟我道歉,我是什麼很賤的人嗎」。原PO認為女店員手塗指甲油泡飲料、吐口水「可能不是第一次這樣做的」,也說爸爸這幾天一直拉肚子,會帶他去大醫院做檢查。...

title: 北水分署攜手台積電 自然碳匯註冊添1例
content: 自然碳匯註冊案再添1例獲審通過,水利署北水分署提出於 石門水庫 北苑植樹自然碳匯專案,經 環境部 審查通過;值得一提的是,此案與 台積電 合作,但最後碳權100%歸北水分署所有。 環境部日前審查通過2件自願減量額度註冊申請案,包含經濟部水利署北區水資源分署「石門水庫北苑園區植樹計畫」、彰化商業銀行股份有限公司「彰銀西松分行汰換高效率照明設備」自願減量專案。 環境部氣候變遷署減量交易組長蘇意筠告訴中央社記者,北水分署一案較特別的地方在於與台積電合作,按計畫書內容,計畫期間30年,台積電除了協助出資外,也會進行第1年植樹養護工程,後續29年則回歸北水分署負責;最後的碳權100%為北水分署所有。 根據資料,「石門水庫北苑園區植樹計畫碳匯抵換專案」是北水分署與台灣積體電路製造股份有限公司「台積電植樹薪傳計畫」合作執行。此案也是「溫室氣體自願減量專案管理辦法」上路以來,公私部門合力提出自然碳匯專案註冊、獲審通過的首例。...

title: 逮捕の男は市民税滞納で預金差し押さえ...市役所で62歳男が火をつけ職員3人がケガした事件 納付金額等でトラブルに(東海テレビ)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 7/17(水) 11:32 配信 男が火をつけた現場 画像:市職員提供 愛知県の高浜市役所で7月16日、男が可燃性の液体に火をつけ職員3人がケガをした事件で、男は市民税の滞納を巡り市とトラブルになっていたことがわかりました。 【動画で見る】逮捕の男は市民税滞納で預金差し押さえ...市役所で62歳男が火をつけ職員3人がケガした事件 納付金額等でトラブルに 16日、高浜市役所で起きた事件では、住所・職業不詳の62歳の男が刃物を持って灯油とみられる液体に火をつけ、職員3人がケガをしました。 男は建造物侵入の現行犯で逮捕されましたが、病院でヤケドの治療を受けるため釈放されています。 その後の高浜市への取材で、男は2年ほど前から市民税を滞納していて、今年3月には預金を差し押さえられていたことが新たにわかりました。...

title: Elon Musk Says He Is Moving 'SpaceX' And 'X' Headquarters From California To Texas
content: Billionaire Elon Musk says he's moving the headquarters of SpaceX and social media company X to Texas from California. Musk posted on X, formerly Twitter, on Tuesday that he plans on moving SpaceX from Hawthorne, California, to Starbase, Texas. X will move to Austin from San Francisco. This is the final straw. Because of this law and the many others that preceded it, attacking both families and companies, SpaceX will now move its HQ from Hawthorne, California, to Starbase, Texas....

title: Китай назвал урегулирование украинского конфликта первостепенной задачей
content: ПЕКИН, 17 июля. /ТАСС/. Китай считает содействие урегулированию украинского конфликта первостепенной и неотложной задачей. Об этом заявил глава МИД КНР Ван И в ходе телефонного разговора со своим венгерским коллегой Петером Сийярто. "Китай считает, что самым неотложным вопросом и самой реалистичной целью в настоящее время является содействие скорейшему охлаждению ситуации на Украине и скорейшему достижению всеми сторонами консенсуса о прекращении огня и недопустимости эскалации...

title: Death row killer Ruben Gutierrez's execution halted 20 minutes before lethal injection amid DNA dispute
creator: Abigail O'Leary
content: Ruben Gutierrez's execution has been halted after the inmate's bid for DNA testing. The state of ordered Ruben Gutierrez - who was convicted over the heartless murder of an 85-year-old in 1998 in an effort to steal her retirement money - to be executed on Tuesday evening. However the Supreme Court granted a stay of execution 20 minutes before he was scheduled to face a in a death chamber at Huntsville, Texas. The inmate has long maintained that DNA testing would help prove he wasn't responsible...

title: Suspect shot near RNC site by Columbus police officers was brandishing knives, authorities say
content: MILWAUKEE — Ohio police officers in Wisconsin for the Republican National Convention who was wielding two knives near the convention, Milwaukee’s police chief said Tuesday. Five members of the Columbus police department fired on the man, who had a knife in each hand, refused police commands and charged at an unarmed man before police fired, Milwaukee Chief Jeffrey Norman said at a news conference. Two knives were recovered from the scene, the chief said. Police released body camera footage that...

title: В "Ростехе" рассказали о бомбе, которая может накрыть взрывом 11 футбольных полей
creator: Газета.Ru
content: В «Ростехе» рассказали о бомбе, которая может накрыть взрывом 11 футбольных полей Трехтонная фугасная авиабомба ФАБ-3000 способна накрыть взрывом площадь в 11 футбольных полей. Об этом сообщает РИА Новости со ссылкой на представителя государственной корпорации «Ростех». В компании подчеркнули, что ударная волна одной бомбы ФАБ-3000 позволяет уничтожить взводный опорный пункт Вооруженных сил Украины (ВСУ). Отмечается, что такие бомбы имеют заряд взрывчатого вещества около полутора тонн....

title: 'Just assume everything is deadly': NKY Health Dept. issues overdose warning after spike leaves 3 dead
creator: Sean DeLancey
content: FLORENCE, Ky. — Five people overdosed in Boone County Tuesday, bringing the total to 49 in less than 30 days, according to the Northern Kentucky Health Department. The spike lead to the health department issuing its second OD alert this summer . Three of the most recent overdoses, which happened between July 15 and 16, were deadly. In response to the overdose increase, the health department has recently rolled out pop-up harm reduction tents like the one staffed by Seth Steele on Mall Road in...

title: “중국에 관세 때리면 이 종목이지”...트럼프 말한마디에 술렁이는 희토류株
creator: 매일경제
content: 미국 공화당의 대선 후보인 도널드 트럼프 전 미국 대통령이 대중국 관세를 언급하자 희토류 관련 종목들이 크게 오르고 있다. 17일 오전 11시 20분 현재 유니온은 전일대비 230원(4.55%) 오른 5290원에 거래되고 있다. 같은 시간 유니온머트리얼(2.20%), 티플랙스(0.67%), 노바텍(0.34%) 등도 오르고 있다. 유니온머티리얼은 희토류의 대체 소재로 주목받는 ‘페라이트 마그네트’를 제조·판매 등을 영위하는 업체다. 유니온은 유니온머티리얼의 모회사다....

content: நீலகிரியில் கனமழை வெளுத்து வாங்கி வருவதால் கூடலூர் அருகே உள்ள பாடந்துறை ஆற்றில் கடும் வெள்ளப்பெருக்கு ஏற்பட்டு குடியிருப்புகள் மற்றும் சாலைகள் வெள்ளத்தில் மூழ்கியது.

title: Mahomes, quarterback de Chiefs, dice que tras el nacimiento de su 3er hijo no tendrá más
creator: Agencia AP
content: ST.JOSPEH, Misuri, EE.UU. (AP) — El quarterback de los Chiefs Patrick Mahomes y su esposa Brittany anunciaron recientemente que están a la espera de su tercer bebé. No esperen a un cuarto. “Terminé. Es lo que diré. He hecho tres y terminé”, dijo Mahomes el martes con una sonrisa irónica, poco después de haber ingresado a su dormitorio en el campamento de prácticas en el campus de la Universidad de Western State Missouri. title: «Ростех» раскрыл способности бомбы ФАБ-3000
creator: Евгений Силаев
content: Одна бомба ФАБ-3000 способна уничтожить целый взводный опорный пункт Вооруженных сил Украины (ВСУ). Ее способности раскрыл представитель корпорации «Ростех» в беседе с РИА Новости . «Бомбы ФАБ-3000 имеют заряд взрывчатого вещества около полутора тонн. На практике это означает, что при взрыве создается ударная волна, позволяющая уничтожить цель типа взводного опорного пункта ВСУ с земляными укреплениями открытого типа», — рассказал собеседник агентства. Он отметил, что взрыв бомбы способен...

title: 「重たいニャン」ネコがネコを運ぶ! 運ばれるネコは“されるがまま”どんな気持ち?(テレビ朝日系(ANN))

content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 7/17(水) 11:32 配信 「1日1回笑う」山形が条例制定 知事は苦笑「やや戸惑った」 “内心の自由”侵害? 山形県議会で成立した、県民に「笑い」を求める条例が物議を醸しています。 【画像】「大好きだと叫んでみて」埼玉・川口市には“プライド条例” 山形県 吉村美栄子知事「やや戸惑ったようなところもございますけれど、県民が安心して笑って過ごせる県政に全力を挙げるのが、私の役割だと思っています。そういうことです」 そう語る知事の表情は、苦笑い。議論を呼んでいるのは、今月5日に山形県議会で成立した「笑いで健康づくり推進条例」です。 笑いに関する条例の制定は全国で初めてとみられ、県民には「1日1回は笑うことなどに努める」ことを求めています。 条例案を提出した自民党の議員に、その狙いを聞いてみました。自民党...

content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 7/17(水) 11:32 配信 CBCテレビ 藤井聡太七冠が自身2つ目となる「永世称号」の資格獲得を目指す「王位戦七番勝負」の第2局が始まりました。 【写真を見る】藤井聡太七冠(21) 函館で王位戦第2局始まる タイトル防衛すれば2つ目の「永世称号」 へ 渡辺明九段(40)の挑戦受ける 藤井七冠が渡辺明九段の挑戦を受ける、王位戦七番勝負の第2局は午前9時に北海道函館市で始まりました。先に4勝でタイトルを獲得する王位戦で、第1局は藤井七冠が逆転勝利しました。(藤井聡太 七冠)「2日間の長い戦いになるので、一手一手読みを入れて皆様に楽しんで頂けるような将棋を指せれば」藤井七冠は今期の王位戦も防衛し5連覇すれば、「永世棋聖」に続き「永世王位」の資格を獲得します。王位戦第2局は18日夜には決着する見込みです。 CBCテレビ...

title: Do skritih kotičkov čudovite Logarske doline
content: Posledice številnih naravnih procesov so mnoge naravne znamenitosti, kot so slapovi, vršaji, kraške jame, naravna okna, skalni osamelci, zijalke in podobno. Poleg tega se Logarska dolina lahko pohvali s pestrim rastlinstvom in živalstvom, ki ga lahko občudujete že med sprehodom po urejeni pešpoti, ki vodi po dolini. Med drugim lahko občudujete številne ogrožene in zavarovane cvetlice (na primer lepi čeveljc, planiko, kranjsko lilijo), v živalskem svetu pa si lahko pogled spočijete...

title: Bắt thanh niên vi phạm nồng độ cồn tông chết người rồi bỏ trốn
content: Ngày 16-7, Công an TP Thủ Đức (TP HCM) đã bàn giao Lâm Văn Tình (29 tuổi, ngụ tỉnh Bạc Liêu) cho Công an huyện Cần Giuộc (tỉnh Long An) xử lý. Lâm Văn Tình tại cơ quan công an. Thep điều tra, chiều 16-7, Công an TP Thủ Đức phát hiện một thanh niên có dấu hiệu nghi vấn trên đường Võ Trường Toản, phường Linh Trung nên kiểm tra. title: Smylie's tennis ties and Clayton dossier fuel Open tilt
creator: Murray Wenzel
content: Elvis Smylie's mum won a Wimbledon doubles title but the Australian golfer grew up dreaming of winning the British Open. The 22-year-old will get his chance on debut at Scotland's Royal Troon from Thursday, one of six Australians to take on the challenging links course. Smylie's call to mother Liz went to voicemail when he qualified earlier this month, because the four-time grand slam champion was on commentary duties at the All England Club. Her and husband Peter, also a former tennis pro,...

title: NBA moves a big step closer to finalizing new 11-year media rights deals
creator: By TIM REYNOLDS - AP Basketball Writer
content: LAS VEGAS (AP) — The NBA's Board of Governors approved the league's next media rights deals with Disney, NBC and Amazon Prime Video at its meeting Tuesday, moving the league one giant step closer to finalizing the 11-year agreements that will be worth about $76 billion. Now comes the next, and possibly final, step: seeing if Warner Bros. Discovery will match one of the deals in an effort to extend a relationship with the NBA that dates to the late 1980s. WBD has five days to match, that clock...

title: Fired hotel employee behind murder of Aussie couple, Pinay, surrenders
creator: N/A (Carla Bauto Deña)
content: A suspect in the killing of two Australian nationals and a Filipino is escorted under tight security following his surrender in Tagaytay city, Cavite province Philippines on Wednesday, July 17, 2024. A hotel worker found the bodies of three victims, whose hands and feet were tied, on July 10 in a room at a hotel in the popular resort of Tagaytay city, south of Manila. title: El presidente Bukele asegura que en 10 años El Salvador "tendrá seguridad alimentaria"
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: 16 Jul, 2024 10:30 p.m. EST Guardar Nuevo Ciudad Arce (El Salvador), 16 jul (EFECOM).- El presidente salvadoreño, Nayib Bukele, aseguró este martes que en 10 años El Salvador "tendrá seguridad alimentaria", en momentos en que su Gobierno implementa un plan para bajar los precios de los productos de la canasta básica, para "sanar" la economía, y que anunciara que propondrá suspender por una década "todos" los aranceles a algunos alimentos. title: ヘイリー氏「団結した共和党不可欠」 トランプ氏の銃撃事件受け演説
content: 米 の予備選で と候補者指名を争ったヘイリー元 が16日、ウィスコンシン州ミルウォーキーで開催中の党全国大会で演説し、「団結した共和党はアメリカを救うために不可欠だ」と語った。党内の「反トランプ票」を集めたヘイリー氏だが、銃撃事件を受け、党の団結を呼びかけた。 ヘイリー氏の演説の前には、 も会場に登場。前日と同様、銃撃で負傷した右耳にはガーゼのようなものをつけていた。 ヘイリー氏は「トランプ氏は団結の名のもと、私に党大会で話すことを依頼した。私は喜んで受け入れた」と話し、強く支持すると表明した。トランプ氏は立ち上がって拍手を送った。 ■予備選では批判... ※無料期間中に解約した場合、料金はかかりません

title: NXT Great American Bash To Air Over Two Weeks on SyFy, First Match Set
creator: Jeremy Thomas
content: The NXT Great American Bash will be a two-week event this year, airing on SyFy. WWE announced on tonight’s episode of NXT that the Great American Bash will take place on July 30th and August 6th, as you can see below. The shows will air on SyFy due to the Summer Olympics. The first match was made official on tonight’s show, when Roxanne Perez revealed that her NXT Women’s Championship defense for the show will be against Thea Hail. #NXTGAB will be a two-week special on @SYFY starting Tuesday...

title: Giá vàng hôm nay 17.7: Tăng sốc, vàng nhẫn cao hơn vàng miếng gần 1 triệu
content: Giá vàng miếng SJC Chốt phiên giao dịch tuần được Tập đoàn DOJI niêm yết giá vàng SJC ở ngưỡng 75,5 - 76,98 triệu đồng/lượng (mua vào - bán ra). So với đầu phiên giao dịch trước, giá vàng tại DOJI tăng 520.000 đồng/lượng chiều mua vào và giữ nguyên chiều bán ra. Chênh lệch giá mua - bán vàng SJC tại DOJI ở ngưỡng 1,48 triệu đồng/lượng. Điều này cũng giúp rủi ro thua lỗi đối với nhà đầu tư giảm...

title: लेख: क्लाइमेट से जंग, भारत के हाथ क्या लगा?
content: लेखक: कीर्तिवर्धन सिंह: अथर्ववेद में कहा गया है कि पृथ्वी हमारी माता हैं और हम उनके बच्चे हैं। भारतीय दर्शन और जीवन शैली हमेशा से प्रकृति के साथ अस्तित्व की संकल्पना के साथ जुड़ी रही है। भारत प्रकृति को पूजता भी है और इसके अनुसार उत्सव भी मनाता है। एक पेड़ मां के नाम पिछले दस वर्षो के दौरान प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी के नेतृत्व में भारत जलवायु परिवर्तन के विरुद्ध लड़ाई में स्पष्ट रूप से विश्व का नेतृत्व करता हुआ दिखाई दे रहा है। हाल ही में पर्यावरण दिवस के अवसर पर प्रधानमंत्री ने ‘एक पेड़ मां के...
